# gamefabric_protection_protocols (Data Source)

A Protocol identifies game server traffic and network protocol, allowing SteelShield to mitigate DDoS attacks effectively.

For details check the <a href="https://docs.gamefabric.com/multiplayer-servers/multiplayer-services/server-protection/protocols#protocols">GameFabric documentation</a>.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `protocols` (Attributes List) A list of protocols. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocols))

<a id="nestedatt--protocols"></a>
### Nested Schema for `protocols`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) The description of the protocol.
- `display_name` (String) DisplayName is the user-friendly name of a region.
- `name` (String) The unique object name within its scope.
- `protocol` (String) The network protocol used by this protocol.
